official-title.#text: To amend title VII of the Social Security Act to require the President to transmit the annual budget of the Social Security Administration without revisions to Congress, and for other purposes.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Social Security Administration Accountability Act of 2014

short-title.#text: Social Security Administration Accountability Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Amending Social Security Administration Budgetary Matters

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended to read as follows:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 704(b)(1)(A) of the Social Security Act

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall prepare and submit an annual budget estimate for the
directly to the President and Congress.

text.#text: The

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended to read as follows:
shall include in the annual budget prepared pursuant to
the following:

text.#text: The
The total number of cases pending at each hearing office, listed by hearing office, and an aggregate total of all cases pending at all hearing offices.

The total number of cases pending for over the preceding year at each hearing office, listed by both hearing office and presiding administrative judge, and an aggregate total of all cases pending for over such year at all hearing offices.
The average duration of time to process each case at each hearing office, listed by hearing office.
The staffing levels at each hearing office and field office, including a listing of job titles, classifications, and the number of staff within each title and classification.

and the

Committee on Finance of the Senate

header.#text: Closure of Field or Hearing Offices
Moratorium on closure or consolidation of field or hearing offices or new limitations on access to such offices

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Social Security Administration Accountability Act of 2014/s:3/ss:a/p:2

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall take no action on or after the date of the enactment of this Act to close or consolidate field or hearing offices of the Social Security Administration or to otherwise impose any new limitation on access to such offices.

text.#text: Except as provided in

and the
